project_description: This is an experiment in using AI to make all insurance policies readable. Ask a question and AI will answer it in real-time.
questions: What is the deductible for my emergency visits?
How much is my copay for a specialist?
What all is covered for my child?
What is the copay for a primary care visit?
What all services are covered by my insurance?
How much is the extent of coverage for emergency visits?
